text: for as long as I can remember I have
been slightly obsessed with rainbows
it's the colors it's the pattern it's
everything bright that I love and it
reminds me of my childhood I remember
being very small in the sandpit with my
best friend trying to build a stairway
to care-bear heaven I was absolutely
convinced that once I got there the
rainbows would be aplenty and I'd be in
my happy place
and now that I'm an adult absolutely
nothing's changed forever cakes to
rainbow outfits to rainbow earrings I'm
still loving rainbows absolutely
everywhere
there's nothing more fun than a party
and there's nothing more beautiful or
colorful than a rainbow so this really
is gonna be the ultimate party creating
a rainbow party doesn't necessarily mean
you need to go out and find everything
rainbow this is your opportunity to grab
literally every candy you've ever wanted
to try and I'm going to show you how to
style them together so you're not just
putting a bunch of rainbow accessories
on a table you're actually turning the
table into a rainbow itself I'm also
going to show you how to make some
amazing rainbow cakes in a chart and
we're gonna be making some beautiful
rainbow tissue pom-poms to really
accentuate our party and make that
rainbow feature pulse tissue pom-poms
have to be one of the easiest ways to
fill out a backdrop I love that you can
make them out of such inexpensive
materials they're really easy to bring
together and you don't need too many of
them to fill out a massive space I'm
gonna show you how to make a dual color
tissue pom rather than a single one
because you don't need as many of them
to get every single color for our
rainbow incorporated in the backdrop
when you're making a dual color tissue
prom you need two colors of tissue paper
you can choose completely opposing
colors or you can choose sort of a
similar graduation a light purple and a
dark purple perhaps to make a tissue
foam all you need to do is accordion
fold your tissue paper these are
seriously one of the easiest things in
the world and you can change the look
and start by just trimming the tops with
a pair of scissors if you're trim in
like a sharp point will get quite a
jagged rough looking pomp and if you
trim it a nice round mound you're gonna
get a really sort of a smooth fluffy
looking form it's completely up to you
but I've used a combination of both on
my little tissue pom display once you're
happy with the shape all you need to do
is just pull out the individual folds of
tissue paper and kind of flip them up a
little bit you'll be able to allocate
one side to one color and one side to
the other color and it's kind of gonna
sit that way anyway I just attach mine
to a nice blue wall using a little bit
of double sided tape or you can use a
thumbtack but really these guys are
unique because they are two colors and
if you wanted to get creative and put in
three or four I'm not gonna stop you
there's so much candy going on on this
table that I didn't want to put on too
much additional food I'm gonna do some
macarons because they're my mom's
favorite and I know she is definitely
coming to this party with macarons they
can sometimes be a little bit tasty to
bake if you're not experienced with them
or have had bad experiences feel free to
reach out and just buy some because they
can still add that color and they can
save you a ton of time in the kitchen
for Oliver his favorite cupcake in the
world has to be funfetti so here's
specifically requested funfetti cupcakes
of this party I'm gonna make my funfetti
cupcakes in purple cupcake cases because
I know they're gonna sit in my purple
section and just frost them up with just
a little bit of plain vanilla
buttercream frosting and sprinkle with
some nice bright rainbow sprinkles for
our main element I'm gonna show you how
to make a cake in a jar I love things
that come in mason jars there's so much
cuter than regular cakes or cupcakes or
just a slice of cake and I love the fact
that with the rainbow jars you can see
all of these beautiful layers of color
throughout so really they're a visual
and they're a delicious treat you can
actually baked straight into mason jars
seriously these things have absolutely
no limits they can do pretty much
everything all you need to do to bake
your mason jars is take some vanilla
cake mix you want to color it using some
food coloring in six or seven different
colors and individually spoon it
straight into the jar pop that straight
into the oven and it's gonna take a
little longer to bake than a regular
cupcake just because of the size of the
jars I didn't want to overfill mine
because I want to make sure there's
plenty of room for a big fluffy cloud of
frosting your frostings kind of
important here so I'm using my favorite
vanilla buttercream but you want to make
sure that it's a beautiful big soft
fluffy buttercream you can pipe that on
using a star tip which is gonna kind of
give the illusion of the clouds on top
of the rainbow and then a simple
sprinkle of some of your rainbow
sprinkles really completes the look I
stacked those ones up on a plain white
stand because there's plenty of color
going on within the jars and these guys
are after our last centerpiece so we
want them to be the showstoppers at the
table surrounded by all of their candy
colored friends
the one major style element of this
table lies in the green grass so we've
learned our table with green grass and
then I've also covered a couple of
elevated boxes to make it look like sort
of velvety grass steps it adds a little
bit of a start and finish to your
rainbow the main style element of this
table hinges on these little metal
buckets you don't have to get metal ones
but do try to find buckets or containers
that are a solid color I've placed them
in sort of little strategic spots along
the table and that's going to allow me
to divide the table in two separate
colored stripes so I've started with red
and then I've come through to orange and
yellow and so on for all of the colors
of my rainbow once I've got my buckets
in place I'm gonna fill them with some
nice tall candy and that's gonna
designate this section as the pink
section this section will be the purple
section and then I'm just gonna fill it
out with all of my favorite candy if
you've got more pink your pink section
might be a little bit bigger if like me
you love purple your purple section
might take over but this is your
opportunity to create your own rainbow I
absolutely love this effect because I
think it brings in all the elements that
make a real rainbow you've got your
beautiful blue sky you've got your green
grass and then you've got your rainbow
of candy for me this is my ultimate
party rainbow has to be one of my
favourite things when you see a party
like this you can't not be happy we know
life is sweet but it's amazing to think
it can be this colorful
